Posts.Content: Jun 1, 2011 09:56PM CaroleS wrote: I had the injections and scan today, in preparation for SNB in the morning. The nuclear medicine technician told me they have altered the pH balance of the radioactive substance, and patients are experiencing much less pain as a result.  I was skeptical!  But honestly, I had 3 injections (no numbing cream) and it barely hurt at all.
Posts.Title: Radioactive Injection into Nipple NOT TERRIBLE waynesgirl50 Motherofall6
